Body: Description: I am following the scoping for just scanning DFS shares, but all shares are being collected.

Steps to Reproduce Updated: 1. Drop all FS data for the host (to have a clean slate)
2. Configure All shares excluded and DFS only scoping
3. Run FSAA and Bulk Import
4. View all top level shares not just DFS ones
What We've Learned Updated: This works correctly, in NEA 12
Next Steps Updated: Escalate to R&D
